## Subscription.subscribe() method

Creates new child subscription with given subscriber and/or transducer and optional subscription ID.

<b>Signature:</b>

```typescript
subscribe(sub: Partial<ISubscriber<B>>, opts?: Partial<CommonOpts>): Subscription<B, B>;
```

## Parameters

|  Parameter | Type | Description |
|  --- | --- | --- |
|  sub | <code>Partial&lt;ISubscriber&lt;B&gt;&gt;</code> |  |
|  opts | <code>Partial&lt;CommonOpts&gt;</code> |  |

<b>Returns:</b>

`Subscription<B, B>`
